chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_722
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
bilise prior to transfer.
• Pulmonary edema which may be due to iatrogenic fluid overload, therefore do not overload patients with IV
fluids and closely monitor urine output and fluid intake.
• Be aware of abruptio placentae or liver rupture in cases of pre-eclampsia with severe features.
• Renal impairment and acute renal failure may occur following delivery therefore fluid balance monitoring is
essential.
NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA
